sentence.text: To identify novel susceptibility genes and gene negative regulation of transcription, DNA-templateds for obesity, we conducted a genomewide expression association analysis of obesity via integrating genomewide association study (GWAS) and expression quantitative trait loci (eQTLs) data.
The SMR single gene analysis results were further subjected to gene negative regulation of transcription, DNA-templated enrichment analysis (GSEA) for identifying obesity associated gene sets.
